page.title: 20CHILDREN-BLEWBURY
page.content: P.IS TEN YEARS OLD AND WAS BORN IN BLEWBURY.HE IS AN ONLY CHILD.HIS FATHER IS A LANDSCAPE GARDENER.HE STARTS HIS DAY AT ABOUT 8 A.M.,HAS BREAKFAST AND GOES TO SCHOOL,HOPING TO BE ON TIME FOR A SHORT GAME OF FOOTBALL BEFORE LESSONS STARTING AT 9.A.M.LESSONS LAST UNTIL 12.00,WITH A SHORT BREAK AT 10.40.HE HAS LUNCH AT SCHOOL AND LESSONS START AGAIN AT 1.P.M.SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.P.M HE RETURNS HOME,DOES HIS HOMEWORK THEN GOES OUT TO PLAY WITH HIS FRIENDS FOR ONE HOUR,THEN HE HAS A MEAL WITH HIS PARENTS,DOES SOME BALLET PRACTICE AND GOES TO BED.- WHEN ASKED ABOUT THEIR OPINIONS ABOUT THE VILLAGE,P.AND HIS FRIENDS COMMENTED THAT THEY WOULD LIKE THE RECREATION GROUND IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE SO THEY WOULD NOT HAVE TO CROSS A MAJOR ROAD,MORE ACTIVITIES AND CLUBS FOR CHILDREN.THEY ALSO WOULD LIKE LESS MODERN HOUSES BEING BUILT.
